name: ConfiDodge
description:
Entry for the BulletHell Jam : Game made alone in 10 days

Better experience with gamepad !

Theme

-How is your confinement going?

-Being 4 walls! Always between 4 walls, I can't stand these 4 walls anymore! I want to escape!

Features
  • Full gamepad support
  • 50 levels
  • A very simple maze
  • Simple controls : Move and Dash
  • Multiple environnements
  • Multiple goal depending on stage
Credits

Character sprites from : Dungeon Crawler 2D Art Pack [Unity Asset store]
Music from SMP1 Music Pack

More

I did not have enough time to do everything I wanted to do, including :

  • Different powers for the player ( shield, invicibility, etc.)
  • Achievements
  • More levels & A good finish ;)

But the game is fully enjoyable like that ;) I hope you will like it !
